SECURITY: [Short summary of the vulnerability fixed]

Detailed description:
- What vulnerability was fixed (e.g., Reflected XSS, Stored XSS, etc.)
- Impact of the vulnerability
- Affected versions (if applicable)
- How the issue was fixed or mitigated
- Reference to any related advisory or CVE number (if available)
- Credit to the reporter (e.g., Thanks to Adrian (@GitHubUsername))

Example:

SECURITY: Fix Reflected and Stored XSS vulnerabilities

Detailed description:
- Fixed two authenticated XSS issues that allowed malicious scripts to be executed via query parameters and stored user inputs.
- Affected all versions prior to v1.2.3.
- Sanitized inputs and escaped outputs to prevent injection.
- See GitHub Security Advisory GHSA-XXXX-YYYY-ZZZZ and CVE-2025-XXXX.
- Thanks to Adrian (@adrianGitHub) for responsible disclosure.
